price: Ẹ̀yin ìjọ mi, ẹ wọn kóńgò àti òṣùwọ̀n kún ní dọ́gban̄n̄dọ́gba. Ẹ má ṣe dín n̄ǹkan àwọn ènìyàn kù. Kí ẹ sì má ṣèbàjẹ́ sórí ilẹ̀.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi awfū al-mik'yāla wal-mīzāna bil-qis'ṭi walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
